content: As with all Drinks, the potency of this can be increased by finding the Awoken Wine Worm locations around the game's areas. Our page has all of their locations for you.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bluebridge_Romance.md', within the main section titled 'Bluebridge Romance'.
The content is as follows:
As with all Drinks, the potency of this can be increased by finding the Awoken Wine Worm locations around the game's areas. Our page has all of their locations for you.
